name: AQUA (itch) (madebyAyan)
description:
A game made for the BYOG 2019 game jam.

Your prison along with all the people present in it are taken to another realm  (AQUA) by a mysterious voice. He offers you help in escaping the prison, however, he wants you to kill everyone first.

In the AQUA realm, all organic beings are frozen, except for you. So it won't be difficult to kill them all and escape.

Even though it might be easy to kill everyone, would you be willing to do that? Would you kill every person just so that you could escape?

After seeing a glimpse of everyone's life and getting to know them a little better through that, are you still willing to kill them?

You know what's right and what's not, yet you choose to focus on just yourself and ignore the right path, what are you so afraid of?
